name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a sesame seed bun.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce mixed with fettuccine pasta and parmesan cheese.

name: Sushi Platter
description: A variety of fresh sushi rolls, including salmon, tuna, and avocado.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce and steamed vegetables.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with a layer of creamy chocolate frosting.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender, slow-cooked ribs covered in a smoky barbecue sauce.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce.
